DOC.brief_summary: Objective : The investigator seek investigate analgesic efficiency lidocaine spray , paracervical block ( PCB ) lidocaine PCB lidocaine plus lidocaine spray combination patient undergo first-trimester surgical abortion . Methods : A randomized , double-blind , placebo-controlled clinical trial conduct 108 woman request pregnancy termination.The subject randomly assign four group : PCB ( n=27 ) , lidocaine spray ( n=27 ) , PCB plus lidocaine spray ( n=27 ) placebo ( n=27 ) .Intraoperative postoperative pain score measure standard Visual Analog Scale ( VAS ) .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Lidocaine Spray Paracervical Block Application Pain Relief During First-trimester Surgical Abortion : Randomized , Double-blind , Placebo-controlled Trial
DOC.criteria: Age > 18 year Single Pregnancy < 7 week gestation Incomplete abortion Early pregnancy failure Acute cervicitis Untreated pelvic inflammatory disease Cervical stenosis
